                match
                    dst-ip 79.91.42.0/24
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21027 create
                match
                    dst-ip 172.28.176.0/24
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21028 create
                match
                    dst-ip 37.229.165.0/24
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21029 create
                match
                    dst-ip 194.169.50.89/32
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21030 create
                match
                    dst-ip 218.153.121.45/32
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21031 create
                match
                    dst-ip 218.153.121.46/32
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21032 create
                match
                    dst-ip 194.169.62.129/32
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21033 create
                match
                    dst-ip 79.91.39.16/32
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21034 create
                match
                    dst-ip 79.91.39.20/32
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 21035 create
                match
                    dst-ip 37.15.244.128/29
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
        exit
        ipv6-filter 1005 name "1005" create
            default-action forward
            description "Filtre"
        exit
        ipv6-filter 2000 name "2000" create
            description "Filtres"
            scope embedded
            entry 12501 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Packet-too-big type 2"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type packet-too-big
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12504 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Echo Request type 128"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type echo-request
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12505 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Echo Reply type 129"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type echo-reply
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12506 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Router Solicitation type 153"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type router-solicitation
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12507 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Router Advertisement type 154"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type router-advt
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12508 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Neighbor Solicitation type 155"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type neighbor-solicitation
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12509 create
                description "Accept ICMPv6 Neighbor Advertisment type 156"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                    icmp-type neighbor-advertisement
                exit
                action
                    forward
                exit
            exit
            entry 12900 create
                description "Drop ICMPv6 non-accepte avant"
                match next-header ipv6-icmp
                exit
                action
                    drop
                exit
            exit
        exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Filter Log Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    filter
        log 104 create
            description "IPV4-FILTER-LOG"
        exit
        log 106 create
            description "IPV6-FILTER-LOG"
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Filter Match lists Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    filter
        match-list
            ip-prefix-list "DEEPFIELD" create
                description "DEEPFIELD"
                prefix 10.61.29.241/32
                prefix 10.61.29.242/32
            exit
            ip-prefix-list "EQUIPEMENTS" create
                description "EQUIPMENTS"
                prefix 172.26.101.3/32
                prefix 172.26.42.48/32
                prefix 172.26.15.65/32
                prefix 172.25.100.108/32
                prefix 172.24.49.17/32
                prefix 172.24.48.5/32
            exit
            ip-prefix-list "TOTO1" create
                description "TOTO1"
                prefix 218.152.120.58/32
                prefix 218.152.120.60/32
                prefix 218.152.144.6/32
                prefix 218.141.22.128/25
            exit
            ip-prefix-list "FLOW" create
                description "FLOW"
                prefix 10.48.122.153/32
                prefix 10.48.122.169/32
                prefix 218.152.120.58/32
                prefix 218.152.120.59/32
                prefix 218.152.120.60/32
                prefix 218.152.144.6/32
            exit
            ipv6-prefix-list "PAR" create
                prefix d910:f180:2a7f:358f:6f50:4084:75d5:101/128
                prefix d910:f180:2a7f:358e:985c:15ea:6a75:4401/128
                prefix d910:f180:2a7f:3589:75b5:7f9e:9b85:7001/128
                prefix d910:f180:2a7f:3588:885c:1fdb:fce8:4f01/128
            exit
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "L2TP Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
        l2tp
            group "LNS" protocol v2 create
                tunnel "LNS" create
                    local-name "BNG-ATHENA"
                    peer 195.185.47.234
                    no shutdown
                exit
                no shutdown
            exit
            no shutdown
        exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Management Router Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    router management
        static-route-entry 10.205.205.66/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 10.205.204.0/24
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 10.53.105.241/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 10.61.221.151/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 172.26.15.65/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 172.29.80.0/24
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 172.17.110.238/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 172.17.110.249/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
        static-route-entry 172.17.110.252/32
            next-hop 10.60.228.254
            exit
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Mirror Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    mirror
        mirror-dest 19001 name "19001" type ip-only create
            description "TPLALIS-d01-1"
            encap
                layer-3-encap ip-udp-shim create
                    gateway create
                        ip src 218.152.120.74 dest 218.141.22.146
                        udp src 23457 dest 23000
                    exit
                exit
            exit
            no shutdown
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Multicast Path Management Policy Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    mcast-management
        bandwidth-policy "14-SEC-PATHS" create
            t2-paths
                secondary-path
                    number-paths 14 redundant-sfm 14
                exit
            exit
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "RADIUS Server Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
        radius-server
            server "RADIUS-ACCT" address 195.85.40.21 secret "netconanRemoved16" hash2 create
                description "Radius serveR"
                acct-port 1646
            exit
            server "RADIUS-AUTH" address 195.85.40.20 secret "netconanRemoved17" hash2 create
                description "Radius server"
                accept-coa
                auth-port 1645
                coa-script-policy "RADIUS-IN-DEF"
            exit
        exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Redundancy Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    redundancy
        multi-chassis
            peer 218.152.120.75 create
                description "BNG02-PAR"
                sync
                    igmp
                    srrp
                    sub-mgmt ipoe pppoe
                    port lag-30 create
                        range 100.1-100.499 sync-tag "tag1110"
                        range 100.1000-100.1000 sync-tag "tag1110"
                        range 835.1-835.24 sync-tag "tag1310"
                        range 835.1000-835.1000 sync-tag "tag1310"
                        range 836.1-836.24 sync-tag "tag1410"
                        range 836.1000-836.1000 sync-tag "tag1410"
                        range 1000.1-1000.499 sync-tag "tag1010"
                        range 1000.1000-1000.1000 sync-tag "tag1510"
                        range 1001.1-1001.499 sync-tag "tag1510"
                    exit
                    port lag-36 create
                        range 100.1-100.499 sync-tag "tag1106"
                        range 100.1000-100.1000 sync-tag "tag1106"
                        range 1000.1-1000.499 sync-tag "tag1006"
                        range 1000.1000-1000.1000 sync-tag "tag1006"
                        range 1001.1-1001.499 sync-tag "tag1506"
                        range 1001.1000-1001.1000 sync-tag "tag1506"
                    exit
                    no shutdown
                exit
                no shutdown
            exit
        exit
        synchronize boot-env
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "BGP Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
        bgp
            ibgp-multipath
            enable-peer-tracking
            advertise-external ipv4 ipv6 label-ipv4 label-ipv6
            backup-path ipv4 ipv6 label-ipv4 label-ipv6
            next-hop-resolution
                policy "NEXT-HOP-TRACKING"
                shortcut-tunnel
                    family ipv4
                        resolution-filter
                            ldp
                        exit
                        resolution filter
                    exit
                exit
            exit
            peer-tracking-policy "PEER-TRACKING"
            rib-management
                ipv6
                    route-table-import "RIB_LEAK"
                exit
                label-ipv6
                    route-table-import "RIB_LEAK"
                exit
            exit
            group "IP"
                description "Interco eBGP pour extension domaine PIM"
                family ipv4
                loop-detect discard-route
                prefix-limit ipv4 1
                prefix-limit ipv6 1
                type external
                multihop 255
                import "default-reject"
                export "EXPORT-ALL-MULTICAST-SOURCES" "default-reject"
                peer-as 65500
                ttl-security 255
                neighbor 79.92.218.245
                    description "PTN00115_IP"
                exit
            exit
            group "EBGP"
                description "acces pour Flux"
                family ipv4
                loop-detect discard-route
                type external
                multihop 255
                preference 9
                import "COLLECTE-IPv4-IMPORT" "default-accept-bgp"
                export "EXPORT-ALL-SOURCES" "default-reject"
                peer-as 65500
                ttl-security 255
                neighbor 78.197.9.157
                    description "PAR38-W01-AGR-IP"
                    peer-as 65510
                exit
            exit
            no shutdown
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Subscriber-mgmt Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    subscriber-mgmt
        auto-sub-id-key
            ipoe-sub-id-key mac
        exit
        authentication-policy "AUTH-DEF" create
            description "Radius Authentification par defaut"
            password "netconanRemoved7" hash2
            user-name-format circuit-id
            pppoe-access-method none
            include-radius-attribute
                circuit-id
                remote-id
                nas-port-id
                nas-identifier
                dhcp-options
                dhcp6-options
                access-loop-options
                mac-address
            exit
            radius-server-policy "RADIUS-AUTH-DEF"
        exit
        radius-accounting-policy "ACCT-DEF" create
            description "Radius"
            no queue-instance-accounting
            session-accounting interim-update
            include-radius-attribute
                acct-authentic
                circuit-id
                delegated-ipv6-prefix
                framed-ip-addr
                mac-address
                nas-identifier
                nas-port-id
                remote-id
                sla-profile
                sub-profile
                subscriber-id
                user-name
                access-loop-options
                no detailed-acct-attributes
                std-acct-attributes
            exit
            session-id-format number
            radius-server-policy "RADIUS-ACCT-DEF"
        exit
        ipoe-session-policy "IPOE-DEF" create
            description "IPoE Session policy par defaut"
            session-key sap mac cid
        exit
        sla-profile "QOS-DEFAUT-PROF" create
            inPARss
                qos 128
                exit
            exit
            ePARss
                qos 128
                exit
            exit
        exit
        sub-profile "MIGR" create
            radius-accounting
                policy "ACCT-RED"
            exit
            inPARss
                policer-control-policy "POLICER-SUB-MGMT-DEFAULT"
                exit
            exit
            ePARss
                policer-control-policy "POLICER-SUB-MGMT-DEFAULT"
                exit
            exit
        exit
        sub-ident-policy "COLLECTE" create
            sub-profile-map
                use-direct-map-as-default
            exit
            sla-profile-map
                use-direct-map-as-default
            exit
        exit
        ppp-policy "PPP" create
            description "PPPoE"
            ppp-mtu 1492
            max-sessions-per-mac 2
            ppp-authentication chap
        exit
        local-user-db "AAA-DHCP-RED" create
        exit
        local-user-db "AAA-PPP-RED" create
        exit
        local-user-db "SRV-DHCP-LOCAL" create
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Subscriber-mgmt (Service Side) Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    subscriber-mgmt
        authentication-policy "RADIUS"
            radius-authentication-server
                router "Base"
                server 1 address 195.85.40.20 secret "netconanRemoved18" hash2 port 1645
            exit
        exit
        local-user-db "AAA-DHCP" create
            ipoe
                match-list option60
                host "default" create
                    auth-policy "AUTH-COLL-ETH-RED"
                    server 195.85.40.22
                    no shutdown
                exit
                host "IAD-Profil" create
                    host-identification
                        option60 string "toto"
                    exit
                    auth-policy "AUTH-MIGR"
                    server 218.152.120.74
                    no shutdown
                exit
            exit
            no shutdown
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "TWAMP Light Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
        twamp-light
            reflector udp-port 64364 create
                description "Reflecteur TWAMP"
                prefix 10.185.13.74/32 create
                    description "sonde twamp sur zip intf eth5"
                exit
                prefix 10.185.13.78/32 create
                    description "sonde twamp sur zip intf eth6"
                exit
                no shutdown
            exit
        exit
    exit
#--------------------------------------------------
echo "Vrrp Configuration"
#--------------------------------------------------
    vrrp
        policy 1106
            delta-in-use-limit 100
            priority-event
                lag-port-down 36
                    hold-clear 180
                    number-down 1
                        priority 100 delta
                    exit
                exit
            exit
        exit
        policy 4065
            delta-in-use-limit 100
            priority-event
                lag-port-down 243
                    hold-clear 180
                    number-down 1
                        priority 100 delta
                    exit
                exit
            exit
        exit
    exit
